verses.roman:
sei-kāle śrī-advaita karena ārādhana
tāṅhāra huṅkāre kaila kṛṣṇe ākarṣaṇa

synonyms: sei-kāle—at that time; śrī-advaita—Advaita Ācārya; karena—performs; ārādhana—worship; tāṅhāra—of Him; huṅkāre—by the tumultuous call; kaila—did; kṛṣṇe—to Lord Kṛṣṇa; ākarṣaṇa—attraction.
translation: At that time Śrī Advaita was earnestly worshiping Him. Advaita attracted Him with His loud calls.
